Name: Through White Foam the Jade Butterfly Soars
Desc: A water-dwelling plant that can be found in shallow seas that resembles a striking jade butterfly spreading its wings in the water.\nThis plant is involved in a home remedy passed through the resistance â€” they grind it down into powder and boil it into a poultice that serves as an excellent disinfectant and prevent further infections, combining excellently with the use of other medicines.
